thread.title: From Twitter: Fans celebrate as MS Dhoni hits 92* in 2nd ODI
thread.title_full: From Twitter: Fans celebrate as MS Dhoni hits 92* in 2nd ODI

title: From Twitter: Fans celebrate as MS Dhoni hits 92* in 2nd ODI
text:
‚Äî Bleed DHONIsm ‚ô• (@DHONIism) October 14, 2015 On ur face haters.U questioned Dhoni's place in the team,he has shown u why he is ur daddy!!Take a bow Mahi!! 92* when it mattered the most. ‚Äî manish kumar „ÉÑ (@ManishSEO) October 14, 2015 You believe or not but Dhoni is a much better cricketer than Virat Kohli in every aspect. ‚Äî Shweta Tiwari (@imshwetatiwari) October 14, 2015 Dhoni has answered his critic's in style with 92* runs and last ball six...MSD:The Saviour! ...Ajit aggarkar just got babaji ka thullu :P ‚Äî Ashwarya Chauhan (@ChauhanAshwarya) October 14, 2015 When #Dhoni retires ?? team situation will be same lyk the team which is between dada and dhoni captaincy. ‚Äî San Reddy (@sanreddy07) October 14, 2015 What an amazing innings played by Dhoni.. Well done üëè üëè üëè üëç it's an answer to all those who want him to retire... ‚Äî Tanya Shrivastava (@tanyavikas) October 14, 2015 Dhoni reminds all in style that class is permanent. #2ndODI #IndvsSA . Important knock #captain #performer @msdhoni ‚Äî Ankit Jhaldiyal (@AnkyJhaldiyal) October 14, 2015 A 2 min silence for all those who said Dhoni should retire frm cricket or shud step down frm captaincy #IndvsSA ‚Äî Aabhas Kumar (@I_m_Aabhas) October 14, 2015 Answered his critics in styleee. Dhoni!! The lone warrior. He kept batting, even when wickets fell on the other side #dhoni ‚Äî Swathi Venkatesan (@swathi_v96) October 14, 2015 
Tweets from former cricketers Classy knock from @msdhoni in adversity, India have something to defend now, but will miss @ashwinravi99 #IndvsSA ‚Äî Tom Moody (@TomMoodyCricket) October 14, 2015 Well played @msdhoni fabulous innings under pressure. ‚Äî VVS Laxman (@VVSLaxman281) October 14, 2015 Today's knock shows that Dhoni still has a lot to offer to Indian cricket...but at #4...he must find a way to bat there in ODI. #IndvSA ‚Äî Aakash Chopra (@cricketaakash) October 14, 2015 Dhoni the batsman comes good today. But may still not be good enough for Dhoni the captain. Not enough on the board. Over to you, bowlers. ‚Äî Sanjay Manjrekar (@sanjaymanjrekar) October 14, 2015 Dhoni, quite selflessly, served Indian cricket by batting at 5-6 over the years...he needs someone else to do this for him now. Anyone? ‚Äî Aakash Chopra (@cricketaakash) October 14, 2015
